Text: as, always your uploads are appreciated and treasured.
PS to be clear; this one does not include 'Inferno'. Thanks for the upload TxJag!
It says 5 books and then I provided a link to Inferno. I'd hope people would catch on that Inferno isn't included since its already been uploaded beforehand.

Thank you very much for this. I own hard copies of all of Dan's books, but it is great to have digital copies as well. 
I personally feel that ebooks should be made available to book purchasers as part of the sale.
@Talos63 I like that idea or just the eBook itself. I don't see paper publication going out soon but it could happen in the next 10 - 15 years.

thanks TxJag
i love every Dan Brown's novels, the way he tells the stories are so mind blowing, could you recommend me other authors similiar to Dan Brown?
I tried Steve Berry but, well... not "Dan Brown" enough, hahaha

@boodee I prefer Steve Berry over Dan Brown lol. James Rollins is good, writes a lot of techno-thrillers. Just finished his first Sigma Force novel and loved it. His latest Sigma Force is released pretty soon.
